com.wizzer.mle.math

Class MlScalar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.math.MlScalar

  • public class MlScalar
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a convenience class for specifying scalar values.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard
